org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver
Class ClientEndpointTCP

java.lang.Object
  org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver.ClientEndpointTCP
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientEndpoint
 class ClientEndpointTCP
extends Object
implements ClientEndpoint

Simply delegates all calls to the Socket. This is because the ClientEndpointUDP is modeled after the TCP version.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Benny Bottema

Field Detail

socket

private final Socket socket

reader

private final BufferedReader reader
The input stream from the client on which we're waiting for data. Data is being read with BufferedReader.readLine(), so incoming messages need to end with a newline character '\n'. In addition, to work with Flex clients, an additional NULL character '\0' needs to be added.

Constructor Detail

                  throws IOException
Creates a BufferedReader for the socket's input stream.

IOException - Thrown by Socket.getInputStream().
